lexUnit.name: temple.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the flat part either side of the head between the forehead and the ear.

sentence.text: I 'm not here to be a dolly , dabbing his temples with eau de cologne and picking up his wife 's laundry .
As he swabbed his brother 's temples with cold water , Mike muttered , ` I 'm sorry .
The priest squeezed his temples with thumb and fingers of one hand as if trying to press away a headache .
He grazed her temple with warm lips , then raised his head so he could study her .
In a single movement , he had snatched a vase from the mantelpiece and brought it smashing against Ben 's temple , as neat as the stone through the French window .
The touches of silver at his temples added to the impression of experience and trustworthiness .
He was a tall , attractive man in his mid-forties , the grey hair at his temples giving him a distinguished look .
I dropped the axe , wiped my temples and joined her where she held the incandescent bung away from her skin .
He recalled : ` A piece of the bomb went through my steel helmet and lodged in my temple .
Arty closed his mouth and began to brush the heel of his open hand against his left temple in a repeated gesture of frustration .
She pressed her forefinger into her left temple to ease the escalating migraine that threatened .
Cornelius observed that several strands of J-Cloth wig spelled out the words ` There is no God but Allah " in Arabic across the daddy 's left temple .
You can massage them on your hands , on your temples , or you can use it as a what they call steam inhalation .
He examined the already darkening bump high on her temple .
She clung to him convulsively , gasping as the wound on her temple struck his collar-bone .
On Wednesday night I was seized with an intolerable pain from my right temple to the tip of my right shoulder , including my right eye , cheek , and jaw , and that side of the throat .
Leaning across the girl he placed it firmly against the pimp 's right temple .
The pimp raised himself slowly on his elbows , Chen 's gun pressed all the while against his right temple .
He touched his temple with his right forefinger and Lee saw again the white scar across his knuckles , a remnant of pain from his childhood , still yelling .
Ruth touched her temple , feeling the bruise where Adam had hit her .
Sweat trickled from my temple into my eye ; I blinked and blinked again .
Simone , a good foot shorter and with sweat trickling down her temples , mutely nodded .
His nephew was on the floor , blood trickling from his temple .
He sat back and massaged his temples , his eyes closed .
A small sharp throbbing was beginning in her temples and her eyes felt sore and gritty .
His reddish hair was receding at the temples and his grey eyes rested upon Doreen with obvious relief .

She ground her fists against her temples in an attempt to rub away the tension , the tension that felt like a storm about to break , and then she jerked , eyes wide , head pounding as if there was a pneumatic drill in her brain .
Studying his profile she noticed that he looked pale and red-eyed , and a new fear made her temples throb suddenly .
She felt hot blood shoot straight to her head , making her temples throb .
